name: A Jolly Jumble
description:
This is team Sparklepony submitting our first Ludum Dare as a team, which is for most of us only our 2nd gamejam!

You are a hardened criminal trying to escape from the federation in your christmas tree shaped spaceship. You stole their presents and they're out to get you!

Because of their enormous gravitational force they drag you down and with their incredibly advanced technology they jumble the controls of your spaceship!

Find the new controls quickly on your keyboard to make sure your engines don't stall and outrun the federation as long you can.

Ludum dare entry page:

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=p...

Please comment and let us know what you think!
